title: My rank T_T
body:
Hi Guys,
Yep after my promos I am gonna cry. I won 10/10 of my promos and got silver five. Riot whyyyyyyyyyyyyyy. 
I was silver three at the end of season and during the season I climbed to gold. Then I got demoted to silver three and then climbed back to silver two. So why riot why T_T
Jomok2012
PS the new ranked champion select has made me have not a single toxic player on my team :D Thnx guys

replies.body: When u get demoted to silver from gold ur mmr is silver 5. So your mmr was just bad. Thats why your placed lower.
Yeah I guess it just sucks cause I won like 10 games in a row I thought I would get middle silver at least :/
coulda been worse, coulda been b5
